title: iPS Cells   schema
description: Pluripotent stem cells derived by reprogramming cells of lower potency to a pluripotent state. iPSC lines are ideally derived from a single colony of de-differentiated cells to maintain genetic heterogeneity, and can be maintained in culture as pluripotent cells indefinitely.

items.title: IP_Alternative_Name
items.description: Other relevant names

items.schema:description: Other relevant names

items.description: Other relevant IDs for cells

items.title: IP_Center_Canonical_ID
items.description: LINCS DSGC-specific canonical ID. This will be assigned by a given LINCS DSGC according to its cell registration scheme
items.schema:name: IP_Center_Canonical_ID
items.schema:description: LINCS DSGC-specific canonical ID. This will be assigned by a given LINCS DSGC according to its cell registration scheme

items.description: LINCS center using the cell

items.title: IP_Provider_Name
items.description: Name of vendor or lab (provider) that supplied the iPSC

items.schema:description: ID or catalogue number assigned to the iPSC by the vendor or provider

items.description: Vendor/Provider Batch ID number; Batch or lot number assigned to the cell by the vendor or provider

items.schema:description: Vendor/Provider Batch ID number; Batch or lot number assigned to the cell by the vendor or provider

items.title: IP_Known_Mutations
items.description: Mutations inherent in cell, captured explicitly; e.g. if reference is not available

branches.name: Mutations

items.schema:name: IP_Known_Mutations

IP_Molecular_Features.title: IP_Molecular_Features
IP_Molecular_Features.description: Relevant molecular and morphological features of the iPSCs. (e.g. ER Status)
IP_Molecular_Features.schema:name: IP_Molecular_Features
IP_Molecular_Features.schema:description: Relevant molecular and morphological features of the iPSCs. (e.g. ER Status)

IP_Genetic_Modification.title: IP_Genetic_Modification
IP_Genetic_Modification.description: Stable transfection, viral transduction or any other genetic modifications (de novo mutations, translocations) that were acquired. If yes, the modifications (e.g. expressing GFP-tagged protein) should be described and appropriate references provided
IP_Genetic_Modification.schema:name: IP_Genetic_Modification
IP_Genetic_Modification.schema:description: Stable transfection, viral transduction or any other genetic modifications (de novo mutations, translocations) that were acquired. If yes, the modifications (e.g. expressing GFP-tagged protein) should be described and appropriate references provided

IP_Recommended_Culture_Conditions.title: IP_Recommended_Culture_Conditions
IP_Recommended_Culture_Conditions.description: The culture conditions that are recommended by the vendor when handling the iPSCs
IP_Recommended_Culture_Conditions.schema:name: IP_Recommended_Culture_Conditions
IP_Recommended_Culture_Conditions.schema:description: The culture conditions that are recommended by the vendor when handling the iPSCs

items.title: IP_Culture_Conditions
items.description: A description of the culture conditions that were used to maintain the cells and are suitable for this type of cell
items.schema:name: IP_Culture_Conditions
items.schema:description: A description of the culture conditions that were used to maintain the cells and are suitable for this type of cell

IP_Related_Projects.title: IP_Related_Projects
IP_Related_Projects.description: Other projects in which the iPSCs have been studied / used; A controlled vocabulary describing other large scale projects in which the cells have been used (e.g. ENCODE, TCGA, ICBP, Epigenomics, etc.)
IP_Related_Projects.schema:name: IP_Related_Projects
IP_Related_Projects.schema:description: Other projects in which the iPSCs have been studied / used; A controlled vocabulary describing other large scale projects in which the cells have been used (e.g. ENCODE, TCGA, ICBP, Epigenomics, etc.)

IP_Cell_Markers.title: IP_Cell_Markers
IP_Cell_Markers.description: A controlled vocabulary describing the markers used to isolate / identify the cell type

IP_Production_Details.title: IP_Production_Details
IP_Production_Details.description: This field specifies the procedure(s) by which the cells were derived from the parent/precursor cell, including genetic transformations and phenotypic selections. Citations / source information for constructs and citations for procedures should be included here when appropriate
IP_Production_Details.schema:name: IP_Production_Details
IP_Production_Details.schema:description: This field specifies the procedure(s) by which the cells were derived from the parent/precursor cell, including genetic transformations and phenotypic selections. Citations / source information for constructs and citations for procedures should be included here when appropriate

items.description: Information pertaining to experimental verification of the primary cell identity; Batch-specific ID; STR profile

items.description: Transient transfection or viral transduction

items.schema:description: Transient transfection or viral transduction

items.title: IP_Passage_Number
items.description: The number of times that the iPSCs had been passaged

items.schema:description: The number of times that the iPSCs had been passaged

items.title: IP_Passaging_Method
items.description: The passaging method that was used for the iPSCs

items.title: IP_Passage_Last_Karyotyping
items.description: The passage number since the last karyotyping

items.schema:description: The passage number since the last karyotyping

items.title: IP_Source_Information
items.description: This is a free-text field that provides detailed source information for this particular batch, which may include information on from whom and when the provider obtained the cells and for what purpose the cells were obtained by the end user
items.schema:name: IP_Source_Information
items.schema:description: This is a free-text field that provides detailed source information for this particular batch, which may include information on from whom and when the provider obtained the cells and for what purpose the cells were obtained by the end user

items.title: IP_Date_Received
items.description: This field specifies when this batch was obtained from the provider. Because YEAR-MO-DY is not always known, this field may only contain partial date information (e.g. YEAR-MO, YEAR only).
items.schema:name: IP_Date_Received
items.schema:description: This field specifies when this batch was obtained from the provider. Because YEAR-MO-DY is not always known, this field may only contain partial date information (e.g. YEAR-MO, YEAR only).

items.title: IP_Center_Specific_Code
items.description: LINCS center-specific coded information that can include in its format information regarding the parent / protocol used / date
items.schema:name: IP_Center_Specific_Code
items.schema:description: LINCS center-specific coded information that can include in its format information regarding the parent / protocol used / date
